Race.SpecificTitle: Law Enforcement Sub-District No. 1 -- 1/2% S&U Renewal - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Law Enforcement Sub-District No. 1 Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Law Enforcement Sub-District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 19 and 30 of the Louisiana Constitution and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect, a 1/2% tax (the "Tax") (an estimated $4,500,000 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) upon sale at retail, use, lease or rental, consumption and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, all as defined by law, for period of ten (10) years from August 1, 2020, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to provide for law enforcement purposes in the District, including acquiring, operating and maintaining equipment for the Sheriff's office, and providing that $275,000 annually plus 25% of all annual net revenues from the Tax in excess of $2,000,000 shall be dedicated for constructing, improving, operating and maintaining jail facilities in the Parish and paying the cost of feeding, transporting and medical care for prisoners?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Golden Meadow -- 5 Mills Renewal - M&TC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Golden Meadow Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Golden Meadow, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), continue to levy and collect a tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Town (an estimated $46,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining streets and other permanent works of public improvement in the Town?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 9 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 9 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 9 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a tax of ten (10) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $66,950 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes and charges for fire hydrant rentals and service?
